protocol_name: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
protocol_name_html: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
description: This protocol is used to clarify the process of total DNA extration for our R. crenulata genome.
protocol_affiliation: Institute of Chinese Medical Sciences, University of Macau, China
manuscript_citation: Fu Y, Li L, Hao S, Guan R, Fan G, Shi C, Wan H, Chen W, Zhang H, Liu G, Wang J, Ma L, You J, Ni X, Yue Z, Xu X, Sun X, Liu X, Lee SM, Draft genome sequence of the Tibetan medicinal herb . GigaScience 6(6). doi: 10.1093/gigascience/gix033

source_data.description: Collect and cut 200mg of fresh leaves.

components.data: Add tissues and liquid nitrogen in mortar, grind them into powder with a pestle.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add tissues and liquid nitrogen in mortar, grind them into powder with a pestle.

components.data: Transfer the powder in a centrifuge tube with 1ml of pre-heated CTAB lysis buffer and then mix them.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the powder in a centrifuge tube with 1ml of pre-heated CTAB lysis buffer and then mix them.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 3 of DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name_html: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome

components.data: Incubate the tube for 1 hour at 65°C in the recirculating water bath with mixing gently every 5-10 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the tube for 1 hour at 65°C in the recirculating water bath with mixing gently every 5-10 min.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 4 of DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name_html: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.annotation: Prolong the lysis time to lyse completely if necessary.
source_data.thread_text: Prolong the lysis time to lyse completely if necessary.
source_data.body: Prolong the lysis time to lyse completely if necessary.

components.data: Cool the centrifuge tube to room temperature and centrifuge it at 13,600rpm for 10min at 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Cool the centrifuge tube to room temperature and centrifuge it at 13,600rpm for 10min at 4°C.

components.data: Transfer the supernatant in a new tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the supernatant in a new tube.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 6 of DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name_html: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 6 of DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name_html: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome

components.data: Add the same volume of Phenol : Chloroform : Isoamylol (25: 24: 1) and mix by gentle inversion for 3-5 min at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add the same volume of Phenol : Chloroform : Isoamylol (25: 24: 1) and mix by gentle inversion for 3-5 min at room temperature.
Centrifuge at 13,600rpm for 10min at 4°C.

components.data: Transfer the supernatant aqueous phase in a new tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the supernatant aqueous phase in a new tube.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 9 of DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name_html: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome

components.data: Add the same volume of Chloroform : Isoamylol (24 : 1) and mix by gently inverting for 3-5min at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add the same volume of Chloroform : Isoamylol (24 : 1) and mix by gently inverting for 3-5min at room temperature.
Centrifuge at 13,600rpm for 10min at 4°C.

components.data: Transfer the supernatant aqueous phase in a new tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the supernatant aqueous phase in a new tube.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 12 of DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome
source_data.protocol_name_html: DNA extration for the R. crenulata genome

components.data: Add 2/3 volume of Isopropanol and 1/10 volume of 3M ammonium acetate, and then mix by slowy inverting.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 2/3 volume of Isopropanol and 1/10 volume of 3M ammonium acetate, and then mix by slowy inverting.
Incubate the tube at -20°C for overnight.

components.data: Centrifuge at 13,600rpm for 10min at 4°C and discard the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at 13,600rpm for 10min at 4°C and discard the supernatant.

components.data: Add 1ml of 70% of ethanol, flick the centriguge tube to resuspend the pellet.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1ml of 70% of ethanol, flick the centriguge tube to resuspend the pellet.
Wash the DNA pellet for 3-5min.

components.data: Centrifuge at 13,000rpm for 5min at 4°C, discard the ethanol.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at 13,000rpm for 5min at 4°C, discard the ethanol.
Add 1ml of 70% ethanol and mix gently.

components.data: Centrifuge at 13,000rpm for 5min at 4°C, discard the ethanol.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at 13,000rpm for 5min at 4°C, discard the ethanol.
Centrifuge at 13,000rpm for 30s, discard the liquid.

components.data: Air dry the pellet for 5-10min at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Air dry the pellet for 5-10min at room temperature.

components.data: Add RNase and 100µl of TE buffer (TE : RNase = 100:1), and then dissolve the pellet at 37°C for 30min in the Thermomixer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add RNase and 100µl of TE buffer (TE : RNase = 100:1), and then dissolve the pellet at 37°C for 30min in the Thermomixer.
